00035 namespace RDK2 { namespace RGraphics {
00036 
00037 uint8_t reduceC8(uint8_t color)
00038 {
00039     switch (color) {
00040         case RImage::C8Black:   return 0;
00041         case RImage::C8Blue:    return 1;
00042         case RImage::C8Green:   return 2;
00043         case RImage::C8Cyan:    return 3;
00044         case RImage::C8Red:     return 4;
00045         case RImage::C8Magenta: return 5;
00046         case RImage::C8White:   return 6;
00047         case RImage::C8Grey:    return 7;
00048     }
00049     return 0;
00050 }
00051 
00052 uint8_t expandC8(uint8_t color)
00053 {
00054     switch (color) {
00055         case 0: return RImage::C8Black;
00056         case 1: return RImage::C8Blue;
00057         case 2: return RImage::C8Green;
00058         case 3: return RImage::C8Cyan;
00059         case 4: return RImage::C8Red;
00060         case 5: return RImage::C8Magenta;
00061         case 6: return RImage::C8White;
00062         case 7: return RImage::C8Grey;
00063     }
00064     return RImage::C8Blue;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void RImage::writeImpl(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException)
00068 {
00069     w->write_i32(width, "width");
00070     w->write_i32(height, "height");
00071     w->write_i32(type, "type");
00072     if (this->type == RImage::C8) {
00073         unsigned char rlebuf[bufferSize];
00074         int p = 0;
00075         unsigned char c = buffer[0];
00076         int n = 0;
00077         for (size_t i = 1; i < bufferSize; i++) {
00078             if (buffer[i] == c && n < 31) {
00079                 n++;
00080             }
00081             else {
00082                 rlebuf[p++] = (reduceC8(c) & 7) | (n << 3);
00083                 n = 0;
00084                 c = buffer[i];
00085             }
00086         }
00087         rlebuf[p++] = (c & 7) | (n << 3);
00088         w->writeBytes(rlebuf, p);
00089     }
00090     else {
00091         w->writeBytes(buffer, bufferSize);
00092     }
00093 }
00094 
00095 void RImage::write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException)
00096 {
00097     w->startWriting(getClassName());
00098     writeImpl(w);
00099     w->doneWriting();
00100 }
00101 
00102 void RImage::readImpl(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException) {
00103 
00104     int w = r->read_i32("width");
00105     int h = r->read_i32("height");
00106     Type t = (Type) r->read_i32("type");
00107     setSizeAndType(w, h, t);
00108     if (type == RImage::C8) {
00109         size_t readBytes;
00110         void* voidrlebuf;
00111         r->readBytes(&voidrlebuf, &readBytes);
00112         unsigned char* rlebuf = reinterpret_cast<unsigned char*>(voidrlebuf);
00113         int n = 0;
00114         unsigned char c;
00115         int s = 0;
00116         for (size_t i = 0; i < readBytes; i++) {
00117             c = expandC8(rlebuf[i] & 7);
00118             n = rlebuf[i] >> 3;
00119             if ((s + n) >= bufferSize) throw ReadingException("Something wrong in RLE decoding");
00120             for (int j = 0; j <= n; j++) buffer[s++] = c;
00121         }
00122         delete[] rlebuf;
00123     }
00124     else {
00125         size_t readBytes;
00126         unsigned char* readbuffer;
00127         r->readBytes((void**) (&readbuffer), &readBytes);
00128         memcpy(buffer, readbuffer, readBytes);
00129         delete[] readbuffer;
00130     }
00131 }
00132 
00133 void RImage::read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException)
00134 {
00135     r->startReading(getClassName());
00136     readImpl(r);
00137     r->doneReading();
00138 }
